      • isRequest

        public static boolean isRequest(SOAPMessageContext msgContext)
        If the msgContext is a request return true otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        msgContext - to examine if its a request.
        Returns:
        true if msgContext is a request or false if not.

      • getSoapHeader

        public static SOAPHeader getSoapHeader(SOAPMessageContext msgContext)
                                throws SOAPException
        Return our SOAP header or addSoapHeaderValue one if its not found.
        Parameters:
        msgContext - contains the SOAP header desired.
        Returns:
        the SOAP header if it exists or addSoapHeaderValue one if not found.
        Throws:
        SOAPException - any problems arise adding the SOAP header if missing.

      • addSoapHeaderValue

        public static void addSoapHeaderValue(SOAPHeader soapHeader,
                      QName headerName,
                      String name,
                      String value)
                               throws SOAPException
        Add a SOAP header value.
        Parameters:
        soapHeader - the SOAP header to add a value to.
        headerName - the QName of the SOAP header where we will add value.
        name - the name of the child element for value.
        value - the value to add.
        Throws:
        SOAPException - if any problems arise adding value.

      • addSoapHeaderValue

        public static void addSoapHeaderValue(SOAPMessageContext msgContext,
                      QName headerName,
                      String name,
                      String value)
                               throws SOAPException
        Add a SOAP header value.
        Parameters:
        msgContext - contains the SOAP header for whom we will add value.
        headerName - the QName of the SOAP header where we will add value.
        name - the name of the child element for value.
        value - the value to add.
        Throws:
        SOAPException - if any problems arise adding value.

      • setHandler

        public static <P> P setHandler(P port,
               Handler handler)
        Set the handler for port.
        Type Parameters:
        P - the type of port for web service calls.
        Parameters:
        port - the port for web service calls.
        handler - the new handler to use.
        Returns:
        the port that now has handler in its handler chain.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if service/port are null or if session id is null

      • logSoapMessageIfLevel

        public static void logSoapMessageIfLevel(Logger logger,
                         Level level,
                         String message,
                         SOAPMessage soapMessage)
        Log the soapMessage if the logger level is level.
        Parameters:
        logger - the logger to use for logging.
        level - the log level that if logger's level is equal, will log message and soapMessage
        message - the message to include in the log.
        soapMessage - the SOAP message to log.

        message - the message to include in the log.
